name: riker : volchok Construction, Landscapes & Design
overview:
riker:volchok Construction, Landscapes & Design

riker:volchok Construction, Landscapes & Design is a privately held company located in Waterloo, ON. The company provides landscaping, interior/ exterior construction and design services to clients throughout Waterloo Region.

The company is separated into three divisions. The construction division focuses mainly on offering flooring, trim work, and painting services to clients. The notable landscape division concentrates on lawn care, patios, decks, planting and other landscaping services. The design division provides graphic design, landscape design and general design services. Construction related design services provided include site plans and 3d computer-aided concept drawings.

The companyâ€™s head designer and owner is Cory Matos Friedrich, a highly experienced individual in the local construction industry. Matos Friedrich has provided work with some of the regionâ€™s biggest home builders. He has landscape designed for model homes in the area as well as worked on condominiums, company offices, subdivisions and private homes throughout the area.
